title: Steward CEO on Investors Reconnecting With the Land
itunes:title: Steward CEO on Investors Reconnecting With the Land
description:
Dan Miller, CEO at Steward, discusses the platform that enables people to invest directly in sustainable farms. He also talks about his crowdfunding work and using the internet to raise capital online.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
